nodes.text: Caliban were a weapon manufacturing company that produced the Model X heavy blaster pistol.

Caliban was mentioned in the new Star Wars canon in the 2019 Fantasy Flight Games roleplaying supplement Gadgets and Gear. The company originated in the Star Wars Legends continuity, where it was first mentioned in the 1993 roleplaying supplement Galaxy Guide 9: Fragments from the Rim, which was written by Simon Smith and Eric S. Trautmann for West End Games' Star Wars: The Roleplaying Game. In the Galaxy Guide, the company's name was spelt as "Calban", with the Caliban spelling first being used in the 2002 roleplaying supplement Arms & Equipment Guide, which was written by Jeff Grubb and Owen K.C. Stephens for Wizards of the Coast's Star Wars Roleplaying Game.
